channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Apple reports fourth quarter results
item.description:
PRESS RELEASE October 30, 2025 Apple reports fourth quarter results September quarter records for total company revenue, iPhone revenue and EPSServices revenue reaches new all-time high CUPERTINO, CALIFORNIA Apple today announced financial results for its fiscal 2025 fourth quarter ended September 27, 2025. com (408) 974-3123 © 2025 Apple Inc. Apple and the Apple logo are trademarks of Apple.

Read more

item.title: Minecraft HDL, an HDL for Redstone
item.description:
Minecraft HDL Minecraft HDL is a digital synthesis flow for minecraft redstone circuits. It is an attempt to use industry standard design tools and methods to generate digital circuits with redstone. Example: This file multiplexer4_1.

Read more

item.title: TruthWave – A platform for corporate whistleblowers
item.description:
TruthWave is rewriting this narrative by creating a platform that financially compensates whistleblowers for courageously stepping forward while leveraging a global community built around justice. At its core, TruthWave is an information platform that allows those who possess or locate vital information about corporate wrongdoing to share it securely and anonymously. If you know about corporate wrongdoing, submit a tip to bring those responsible to justice.

Read more

item.title: NPM flooded with malicious packages downloaded more than 86k times
item.description:
“Remote Dynamic Dependencies aren’t visible to static analysis. The code downloads malicious dependencies from URLs, including http://packages. Koi said these dependencies are “invisible” to developers and many security scanners.

Read more

item.title: Taking money off the table
item.description:
Two massive motivators in this decision: It’s way easier to make more money when you already have money. ) All of this to say: it’s easy to become delusional while at a startup — in fact, you could argue that the best startups have that cult-like delusion built into their DNA. There have been hundreds or thousands of startups over the decades, staffed with the best and brightest, with revenue, with customers… and they’ve still bitten the bullet.

Read more

item.title: Some people can't see mental images
item.description:
This was startling information. Was it possible that this was a thing that people other than Bywater could do. It had never occurred to him that remembering could be more than that.

Read more
